property.name: photoshopPathNames
property.shortdesc: A list of the clipping paths stored in the graphic.

property.name: alphaChannelPathNames
property.shortdesc: A list of the alpha channels stored in the graphic.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ClippingPathSettings (a Image, EPS, WMF, PICT, PDF or ImportedPage).

property.name: invertPath
property.shortdesc: If true, inverts the clipping path.

property.name: includeInsideEdges
property.shortdesc: If true, creates interior clipping paths within the surrounding clipping path. Note: Valid only when clipping type is alpha channel or detect edges.

property.name: restrictToFrame
property.shortdesc: If true, truncates the clipping path at the edge of the frame containing the graphic. Note: Valid only when clipping type is alpha channel or detect edges.

property.name: useHighResolutionImage
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the high-resolution version of the graphic to create the clipping path. If false, calculates the clipping path based on screen-display resolution. Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges.

property.name: threshold
property.shortdesc: The lowest value (darkest) pixel to allow in the image. All pixels in the image whose values are greater than (lighter than) the threshold value are clipped (obscured). (Range: 0 to 255) Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges or alpha channel.

property.name: tolerance
property.shortdesc: Specifies how similar a pixel's intensity value can be to the threshold value before the pixel is obscured by the clipping path. (Range: 0 to 10) Note: Valid only when clipping type is detect edges or alpha channel.

property.name: insetFrame
property.shortdesc: Shrinks the area enclosed by the clipping path by the specified amount. (Range depends on the unit. For points: -10000 to 10000; picas: -833p4 to 833p4; inches: -138.8889 to 138.8889; mm: -3527.778 to 3527.778; cm: -352.7778 to 352.7778; ciceros: -781c11.889 to 781c11.889)

property.name: appliedPathName
property.shortdesc: The name of the Photoshop path or alpha channel to use as a clipping path.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: convertToFrame
method.shortdesc: Converts the clipping path to a frame.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ClippingPathSettings.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
